about_the_game:
Overdungeon will release a DLC, containing a brand new card pack, Mr. Almighty on Thanksgiving!
[Content]

1.Mammoth
2.Strong Alpaca
3.Gaussian Trigger
4.Thunder Strike
5.Flame Strike
6.Volley Fire
7.Full Throttle
8.Winding Way
9.Dart Machine Gun
10.Syphon Strike
11.Where the Heart is
12.All Range Barrier
13.Guard Break
14.Maxwell Ritual
15.Over Sheep
16.God Hand Crusher
17.The Final Assault
18.Black Bear Senpai
19.Raging Alpaca
20.Sword of Stoicism

This new pack features all manner of powerful Overload cards. No matter how many Overload you got in a turn, you can at least draw 2 cards next turn, which grants you the mighty force to smash the enemy in a single turn!

17.The Final Assault
18.Black Bear Senpai

20.Sword of Stoicism

This new pack features all manner of powerful Overload cards. No matter how many Overload you got in a turn, you can at least draw 2 cards next turn, which grants you the mighty force to smash the enemy in a single turn!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ VRAM 512MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Overdungeon - Mr.Almighty (Card Pack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
